description: This file contains data structure definitions and functions related to the IGD LANDevice, including device initialization, destruction, and description file generation.

methods.name: LOCAL INT32 _igd_lan_device_desc_file(INOUT FILE * fp,IN const CHAR * uuid)
methods.description: Generates the description file of the LANDevice, writing device details into the provided file pointer.

methods.name: LOCAL INT32 _igd_lan_device_destroy(IN struct upnp_device * pdevice)
methods.description: Destroys and frees resources associated with the LANDevice object.

methods.name: struct:upnp_device * IGD_device_LANDeviceInit(IN VOID * input_index_struct,IN const CHAR * udn,INOUT FILE * fp)
methods.description: Initializes and creates the LANDevice object with associated services, description, and UUID.

ctags.name: IGD_device_LANDeviceInit
ctags.pattern: /^struct upnp_device * IGD_device_LANDeviceInit(IN VOID * input_index_struct, IN const CHAR *udn, /
ctags.signature: (IN VOID * input_index_struct,IN const CHAR * udn,INOUT FILE * fp)
